I would like to provide you with more details you need to help resolve this problem.
I just found out that this is caused because I had the attached VALID ejb 2.0 jar file in the associated ear.

Created an attachment (id=40338)
the ejb 2.0 jar file

Yes, we are having issues loading that ejb jar because it is binary and we are expecting a project.  That is the main issue here, so this is really a duplicate of 140137.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 140137 ***

I think that this defect should be reopened as a reminder to improve the preference page exception logic.
From time to time mallformed projects/jars will be added the ear. I think that the preference page should display correctly even when errors exist in specific jars.
Null checks should be added to avoid the other errors listed above.

I agree ... I'll list as 'major' though, and change abstract. 
Let me know if I've misunderstoond.
I agree. Thats exactly what I meant.
